item.title: How to download Focus Interviews/CCTV video files
item.description:
Recently, some people have asked how to download CCTV’s “Focus Interviews” videos. I immediately thought it was likely encrypted using the m3u8 method, so I quickly dealt with it.

Downloader

https://github.com/nilaoda/N_m3u8DL-CLI

An open-source command-line m3u8/HLS/DASH downloader that supports standard AES-128-CBC decryption, multi-threading, custom request headers, etc. Supports Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese and English. English Supported.

Browser extension

Live Stream Downloader

Honey-glazed confidence

I got the address, thought I was done with it, but it turned out to be nothing. It couldn’t normally parse the segmented content. After checking the information, I found that the official side had handled the download address and required manual replacement. The key parsed by the plugin needs to be manually copied and replaced in the link below.

https://newcntv.qcloudcdn.com/asp/hls/2000/0303000a/3/default/***********************/2000.m3u8

As of January 2024, address testing is valid. If there are any changes afterward, analyze the webpage yourself.

Historical address backup: https://hlswx.cntv.kcdnvip.com/asp/hls/main/0303000a/3/default/A string of characters/main.m3u8?maxbr=2000
